intro: Even before electric lightning, nighttime was a busy time for people in the Bible. What do you know about these nighttime experience?

questions.ask: Which day of creation included God making night?
What prophet, troubled by King Saul's waywardness, cried out all night long to God?
What supernatural source of nighttime light led the Israelites on their journey out of Egypt?
Where was Paul, experiencing a nighttime vision of a man, invited to spread the gospel?
What sin did the apostle Paul tell the Thessalonians is likely to occur at night?

intro: It may have been the New York City of its time - Nineveh was an important place in need of God... Can you recall its story well enough to answer these questions?

questions.ask: What prophet tried to disobey God's call to preach to Nineveh - and was waylaid by a giant fish?
How many days' warning of the destruction to come did God give Nineveh?
What mournful clothing did the people of Nineveh wear to show their repentance before God?
Of 12,000, 120,000, or 1.2 million, what was the approximate population of what God called the "great city" of Nineveh?
What "mighty hunter" built Nineveh shortly after Noah's time?

intro: You see those quotation marks around the letter N... so you know what each answer will begin with. Now get to it!

questions.ask: Who built an ark to save his family and every type of animal from a worldwide flood?
Who did Jesus tell an expert in the Law he should love as himself?
What wall-building Jewish exile has a book of the Old Testament named for him?
What kind of man was Samson, who was never to cut his hair?
What disciple first responded to news of the Messiah by saying, "Nazareth! Can anything good comw from there?"

intro: Have you been keeping count? The Bible is full of numbers... Can you remember these?

questions.ask: How many days did God use to create the world and everything in it?
How many men did Moses send into Canaan to spy out the land?
How many days was Lazarus in the grave before being resurrected?
What, according to Revelation, is the "number of the beast"?
How many silver coins did Judas Iscariot receive for betraying Jesus?
